Comments.Message: This just stung me too. I have a DatePicker on a UserControl, and the host page is handling the PreviewKeyDown event on the UserControl. If the DatePicker has focus and I hit Enter, the event is not bubbling up to the UserControl and my event handler is never called. Annoying!

Oops, it's the KeyDown event on the UserControl that I'm handling. PreviewKeyDown does show me the Enter key, but it fires before I get a chance to catch it on the individual controls, so I need to use KeyDown. Regardless, this is a bug that needs to be fixed.
